text: I'm drew been skiing it with my local
friend Isaac and we're gonna show you
what ten dollars will buy you in Dhaka
yeah imagine 160 million people living

open mind and a willingness to learn
about a new culture people are friendly
and speak English and dip it in a creamy
spicy sauce the most common way to get
food or money buried my favorite Indian
snack milky in total I got a chicken
masala rickshaw ride ticket book Allegro

see you next time for $10 to get you in
